com.facebook.react.devsupport

类 StackTraceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.devsupport.StackTraceHelper

  • public class StackTraceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class converting JS and Java stack traces into arrays of StackFrame objects.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  StackTraceHelper.StackFrameImpl
      Represents a generic entry in a stack trace, be it originally from JS or Java.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String COLUMN_KEY 
      static java.lang.String LINE_NUMBER_KEY 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StackTraceHelper() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static StackFrame[] convertJavaStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Convert a Throwable to an array of StackFrames.
      static StackFrame[] convertJsStackTrace(org.json.JSONArray stack)
      Convert a JavaScript stack trace (see parseErrorStack JS module) to an array of StackFrames.
      static StackFrame[] convertJsStackTrace(ReadableArray stack)
      Convert a JavaScript stack trace (see parseErrorStack JS module) to an array of StackFrames.
      static StackFrame[] convertJsStackTrace(java.lang.String stack)
      Convert a JavaScript stack trace to an array of StackFrames.
      static java.lang.String formatFrameSource(StackFrame frame)
      Format a StackFrame to a String (method name is not included).
      static java.lang.String formatStackTrace(java.lang.String title, StackFrame[] stack)
      Format an array of StackFrames with the error title to a String.
